post.text: This is not simply another 4-year election. This is a crossroads in the HISTORY of our civilization that will determine whether or not We The People reclaim control over OUR government!

comment.author: David
comment.text: I dont' think Trump can win. The voting machines are totally rigged and even if he wins huge, he will still lose Please call your congressman and urge them to pass conventional article V states

replies.author: Anthony
replies.text: Ask for a paper ballot! That will throw them for a loop!

replies.author: David
replies.text: they will just toss them out. This is our last hope that Trump wins
